overview: At some indeterminate point in the future, humanity must come to an end. It may take centuries. It might take eons. But extinction is unavoidable. In this video, LEMMiNO explores a series of doomsday scenarios to better understand when and how this might happen.
tagline: If a star went supernova within 30 lightyears of Earth, it would be cause for concern.
title: Consumed by the Apocalypse
